showScoreExcerpt:
"It’s not too bold to say that 'The Encounter' is out of this world. McBurney’s one-man show is simply like nothing you’ve ever experienced...Starting out as a casual chat, the night at the Barbican soon engulfs us not only in a remarkable story and idea of reality, but also an incredible piece of theatre...'The Encounter' is not just an incredible piece of storytelling, but a true questioning of our existence and society’s perceptions of the world...Simply mind-blowing in every sense."
